t: Amazon Aims to Sublet, End Warehouse Leases as Online Sales Cool - Bloomberg
s: May 21, 2022 - Amazon.com Inc., stuck with too much warehouse capacity now that the surge in pandemic-era shopping has faded, is looking to sublet at least 10 million square feet of space and could vacate even more by ending leases with landlords, according to people familiar with the situation.

t: Amazon Is Gobbling Up Midtown Office Space
s: 1 month ago - Amazon just bought a second Fifth Avenue office building, 522 Fifth, from Aby Rosen’s RFR. It has also leased nearly a million square feet of office space in Midtown East in the last six months.
